title: Fantasy Extravaganza Pt. 2 & AFC East Preview
itunes:title: Fantasy Extravaganza Pt. 2 & AFC East Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – analyze the latest NFL news including the Colts signing free agent cornerback Antonio Cromartie and the Chargers pulling their offer from first-round draft pick Joey Bosa. Then the heroes breakdown the latest episode of “Hard Knocks” before previewing the AFC East. Finally to wrap the podcast, NFL Media’s Fantasy Editor and professional man of leisure Marcas Grant join the heroes to share some over and underrated QBs and TEs in part two of the “Fantasy Extravaganza.” Plus, find out who is the special guest producer?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
